title: App Marketplace Overview
content:
# App Marketplace Overview

## Introduction
The **App Marketplace** is your command center for connecting BasaltCMS with the external tools, platforms, and networks you rely on. From e-commerce engines to social media giants and blockchain networks, managing these connections centrally allows for: 
- **Unified Content Distribution**: Push content to multiple channels at once.
- **Centralized Analytics**: Pull data from Google, Socials, and Stores into one dashboard.
- **Automated Workflows**: Trigger actions in Zapier, Slack, or CRMs based on CMS events.

## Browsing Apps
Navigate to **Apps** in the sidebar. You can filter apps by category:
- **Marketing**: SEO, Email, CRM.
- **Commerce**: Stores and Payments.
- **Social**: Broadcast channels.
- **Web3**: On-chain publishing.
- **Utility**: Automation and messy tasks.
- **Security**: Firewalls and CDN.

## Connecting an App
1. Finds the app card in the marketplace.
2. Click **Connect** (or **Configure** if already active).
3. You will be prompted to either:
    - **OAuth Login**: Redirects you to the provider (e.g., Google, Facebook) to authorize access.
    - **API Key**: Asks you to paste an API Key/Secret from the provider.

## Managing Connections
Active connections show a green status indicator. You can **Disconnect** an app at any time, which will revoke access tokens and stop any sync processes.

title: E-Commerce Integrations
content:
# E-Commerce Integrations

Connect your store to synchronize products, orders, and handle payments.

## Supported Platforms

### Surge (Crypto Payments)
**Surge** is the preferred payment processor for BasaltCMS, enabling instant crypto settlements.
- **Setup**: Click Connect and link your merchant wallet.
- **Features**: Accepts ETH, BTC, SOL, USDC. Auto-converts to stablecoins.

### Shopify
Sync your Shopify inventory to use products within CMS Landing Pages.
- **Setup**: Provide your `Shop URL` and `Admin API Access Token`.
- **Scope**: Read-only access to Products and Collections is required.

### WooCommerce
Connect your WordPress-based store.
- **Setup**: Enter your Store URL, Consumer Key, and Consumer Secret.
- **Tip**: Ensure your WordPress site has the REST API enabled.

### Stripe
Accept fiat payments for subscriptions or invoices.
- **Setup**: Login via Stripe Connect.
- **Mode**: Supports both Test and Live modes.

title: Social Media & Broadcast
content:
# Social Media Integrations

The **Broadcast Studio** relies on these connections to publish content to your audience.

## Meta Suite (Facebook & Instagram)
- **Connection**: Uses OAuth 2.0. You must have a "Business Account" linked to your Page/Instagram Professional account.
- **Features**: Post images, reels, and stories.
- **Expiration**: Tokens expire every 60 days and must be refreshed.

## X (Twitter)
- **Connection**: OAuth 2.0.
- **Tiers**: Free API access is limited. For high-volume posting, an Enterprise API key may be required.

## LinkedIn
- **Connection**: OAuth 2.0.
- **Target**: Supports publishing to Personal profiles and Company Pages.

## Video Platforms

### YouTube
- **Permissions**: Requires `youtube.upload` scope.
- **Shorts**: Videos under 60s are auto-detected as Shorts.

### TikTok
- **Direct Publish**: Push videos directly to your feed.
- **Privacy**: You can set default privacy (Public/Private/Friends) in the config.

### Twitch
- **Stream Key**: Connect to display live status on your site.

## Messaging Apps
Use these for notifications and community alerts.
- **WhatsApp Business**: Requires a Meta Developer App with the WhatsApp API product enabled.
- **Telegram**: Requires a Bot Token (created via @BotFather).
- **Discord**: Uses a Webhook URL for channel updates.
- **Slack**: Connects to a specific channel for team notifications.

title: Web3 & Blockchain
content:
# Web3 Integrations

Publish content on-chain and manage decentralized identity.

## Farcaster
The primary "decentralized social" layer for BasaltCMS.
- **Signer Request**: Connecting Farcaster requires approving a "Signer Request" in your mobile Warpcast app.
- **Hub**: We use a dedicated Neynar Hub for reliable delivery.

## Base (Coinbase L2)
Interacts with the Base blockchain.
- **Capabilities**: Deploy simplified NFT contracts for blog posts.

## Zora
Universal Media Registry.
- **Minting**: Automatically turn uploaded media into Zora mints.
- **Config**: Requires a wallet connection to sign the metadata.

title: Marketing & Utility Apps
content:
# Marketing & Utility Integrations

## CRM & Email

### HubSpot
- **Sync**: Pushes new form leads to HubSpot Contacts.
- **Tracking**: Adds HubSpot tracking pixel to your public pages.

### Mailchimp
- **Newsletter**: Syncs CMS subscribers to a specific Mailchimp Audience list.

### Intercom
- **Widget**: Automatically injects the Intercom Messenger chat widget on your site.

## Analytics

### Google Analytics 4 (GA4)
- **Measurement ID**: Enter your `G-XXXXXXXX` ID to enable tracking.
- **Events**: Page views and form submissions are tracked automatically.

### Algolia
- **Search**: Replaces the default DB search with Algolia's instant search index.
- **Keys**: Requires Application ID, Search API Key, and Admin API Key (for indexing).

## Automation

### Zapier
- **Triggers**: "New Form Submission", "New Order", "New Customer".
- **Actions**: "Create Blog Post", "Update Inventory".

### Slack
- **Notifications**: Get real-time alerts for system events in your team Slack.

title: Security & Infrastructure
content:
# Security & Infrastructure

## Cloudflare
- **CDN & WAF**: Connect your Cloudflare account to manage cache purging and DNS settings directly from the CMS.
- **API Token**: Requires a token with Zone.DNS and Zone.Cache permissions.

## Wordfence
- **Firewall**: Enterprise-grade WAF rules for your CMS.
- **Scan**: Automated malware scanning for uploaded files.
- **Blocking**: Automatically blocks IPs with suspicious behavior.
